Mepersoners Stats: Statgains, Swimgains, Lifespans
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): FAQ: The Most Important Game Data: Mepersoners Stats: Statgains, Swimgains, Lifespans
By mepersoner on Monday, April 30, 2001 - 05:02 pm:

I'll be re-posting the stat gains of every monster after calculating them myself. It'll be on a 1-5 scale.
5= 20 on a HD, 14 or 15 on LD
4= 19 or 20 on HD, 11-14 on LD
3= 14-17 on HD, 8-11 on LD
2= 11-14 on HD, 6-9 on LD
1= 6-10 on HD, 4-7 on LD

PAL players, please note that there is no 'Swim Bug' in your game, so ignore the swimgain number.

Second Prime has the same numbers as prime, only the gain is -1. So a 4 on a LD is 10 - 13 instead of 11 - 14.

The phase right before prime and right after prime are value -1. So a 5 in power would become a 4 in power. I believe the phases right before and right after those phases are value-1 then gain -1.

I don't know the ranges for the first two and last two phases or when a stat hits a value of 0.

By mepersoner on Saturday, May 19, 2001 - 06:57 pm:

Complete potential of every monster
Because of the swim drill bug I did some extra work on the defense.
The best monster is based on stats, lifespan, lifestages (longer prime better), guts, and my personal opinion. Worst is based on the same thing.

Main/SubLifPowIntSklSpdDef (swim)Total best/worstLifespan
Pixies
pixie/pixie125441 (1)17/17400 weeks
pixie/dragon235432 (2)19/19380 weeks
pixie/centaur225431 (2)18/17400 weeks
pixie/wracky225341 (2)18/17480 weeks
pixie/golem224333 (2)17/17420 weeks
pixie/zuum224442 (2)18/18420 weeks
pixie/durahan234433 (2)19/18440 weeks

pixie/hare233441 (2)18/17400 weeks

pixie/kato125441 (1)17/17460 weeks

pixie/suezo125431 (1)16/16420 weeks
pixie/jill235332 (2)18/18420 weeks
pixie/joker225431 (2)17/16380 weeks
pixie/jell225432 (2)18/18420 weeks
pixie/mock125331 (1)15/15460 weeks
pixie/plant324431 (3)19/17460 weeks
pixie/monol124333 (1)16/14380 weeks
pixie/worm324431 (3)19/17400 weeks
pixie/naga233432 (2)17/17380 weeks

best pixie: (pixie/plant) highest stat gains of a pixie when using swim, second highest lifespan, and super fast guts make it in my opinion the best.
worst pixie:(pixie/monol) Although when using it's best stat gains it is stronger than the pixie mock it's guts are probably a bit slower and it's lifespan is worse by almost 2 years.
